channel.title: 637/639 Boss focusing to all players in combat
channel.description:
Hello I need help with this. Today I made own boss, but I want it to hit each person who is in his area like dementhium Skeletal Horror. Just wondering, maby there is something to do with areaTick?
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4jgpracZuyg[/youtube]
Please help.
#Rikay
